member.name: MetafileHeader.GetBounds
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.GetBounds method gets the bounding rectangle for the associated metafile.
member.param: Pointer to a Rect object that receives the bounding rectangle.

member.name: MetafileHeader.GetDpiX
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.GetDpiX method gets the horizontal dots per inch of the associated metafile.
member.returns: This method returns a real number that indicates the horizontal dots per inch of the associated metafile.

member.name: MetafileHeader.GetDpiY
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.GetDpiY method gets the vertical dots per inch of the associated metafile.
member.returns: This method returns a real number that specifies the vertical dots per inch of the associated metafile.

member.name: MetafileHeader.GetEmfHeader
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.GetEmfHeader method gets an structure that contains properties of the associated metafile.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the EMF or EMF+ format, this method returns a pointer to an structure that contains properties of the associated metafile. If the associated metafile is in the WMF format, this method returns NULL.

member.name: MetafileHeader.GetEmfPlusFlags
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.GetEmfPlusFlags method gets a flag that indicates whether the associated metafile was recorded against a video display device context.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the EMF+ format and was recorded against a video display device context, then this method returns GDIP_EMFPLUSFLAGS_DISPLAY; otherwise, it returns 0. GDIP_EMFPLUSFLAGS_DISPLAY is defined in Gdiplusmetaheader.h.

member.name: MetafileHeader.GetMetafileSize
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.GetMetafileSize method gets the size, in bytes, of the metafile.
member.returns: This method returns a UINT that specifies the size, in bytes, of the metafile.

member.name: MetafileHeader.GetType
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.GetType method gets the type of the associated metafile.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the type of the associated metafile.

member.name: MetafileHeader.GetVersion
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.GetVersion method gets the version of the metafile.
member.returns: This method returns the version of the metafile. The metafile version indicates whether the metafile is an EMF, EMF+, or WMF metafile. EMF files always have 0x0010000 as the version. EMF+ files currently have 0xdbc01001 as the version. WMF files usually have 0x0300 as the version; however, earlier versions may be 0x0100.

member.name: MetafileHeader.GetWmfHeader
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.GetWmfHeader method gets a structure that contains properties of the associated metafile.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the WMF format, this method returns a pointer to a structure that contains properties of the associated metafile. If the associated metafile is in the EMF or EMF+ format, this method returns NULL. The structure is defined in Wingdi.h.

member.name: MetafileHeader.IsDisplay
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.IsDisplay method determines whether the associated metafile was recorded against a video display device context.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the EMF+ format and was recorded against a video display device context, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: MetafileHeader.IsEmf
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.IsEmf method determines whether the associated metafile is in the EMF format.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the EMF format, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: MetafileHeader.IsEmfOrEmfPlus
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.IsEmfOrEmfPlus method determines whether the associated metafile is in either the EMF or EMF+ format.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the EMF or EMF+ format, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE. In particular, this method returns FALSE if the associated metafile is in the WMF format.

member.name: MetafileHeader.IsEmfPlus
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.IsEmfPlus method determines whether the associated metafile is in the EMF+ format.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the EMF+ format, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE. In particular, this method returns FALSE if the associated metafile is in the EMF or WMF format.

member.name: MetafileHeader.IsEmfPlusDual
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.IsEmfPlusDual method determines whether the associated metafile is in the EMF+ Dual format.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the EMF+ Dual format, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE. In particular, this method returns FALSE if the associated metafile is in the WMF, EMF, or EMF+ Only format.

member.name: MetafileHeader.IsEmfPlusOnly
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.IsEmfPlusOnly method determines whether the associated metafile is in the EMF+ Only format.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the EMF+ Only format, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE. In particular, this method returns FALSE if the associated metafile is in the WMF, EMF, or EMF+ Dual format.

member.name: MetafileHeader.IsWmf
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.IsWmf method determines whether the associated metafile is in the WMF format.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is in the WMF format, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE. In particular, this method returns FALSE if the associated metafile is in the EMF or EMF+ format.

member.name: MetafileHeader.IsWmfPlaceable
member.summary: The MetafileHeader.IsWmfPlaceable method determines whether the associated metafile is a placeable metafile.
member.returns: If the associated metafile is a placeable metafile, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.
